metadata.title: Thursday, 5th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the construction of a hospital in Ngabwe District will commence; and
(b)    when Anti-Retroviral Therapy services will be introduced in the District.

questions.minister: Minister of Works and Supply when the Milenge-Kasanka road will be upgraded to bituminous standard.

parts: (a)    which projects will be financed using the US$1.25 billion Eurobond that was recently issued;
(b)    how much will be spent on each project;
(c)    when the loan is due for repayment; and

(d)    what measures have been taken to ensure that the Government does not default on the repayment. NOTICE OF MOTION AND ORDER OF THE DAY The Minister of Finance Ways and Means :     That the House do now resolve into Committee of Ways and Means to consider the raising of supply. 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate: (Head 85/01: under consideration). Heads 85/02, 85/03, 85/04, 85/07, 85/08, 85/09, 85/10, 64/01, 64/07, 64/08, 64/09, 64/10, 05/01 and 87/01- for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 85    -    Ministry of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection Head 64    -    Ministry of Works and Supply Head 05    -    Electoral Commission Head 87    -    Anti-Corruption Commission _________________________
